lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. president, Mark Emmert, said the organization would examine “the actions, and inactions, of relevant responsible personnel” regarding the Penn State scandal.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. president, Mark Emmert, said the organization would examine “the actions, and inactions, of relevant responsible personnel” regarding the Penn State scandal.
